Seydou Ali Yacouba (amụrụ ya n'April 6, 1992 na Niamey, Niger) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naijeria nke na-agba bọọlụ na USM Alger na otu bọọlụ mba Niger.
A mụrụ ya na Niamey, Yacouba malitere igwu egwu dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ na AS Police na ndị otu ndị ntorobịa mba Niger
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, ọ kwagara Côte d'Ivoire iji sonye na Africa Sports National. Mgbe ọ dị afọ 20, ọ kwagara Algeria iji sonye na USM Alger
Na Jenụwarị 12, 2013, ha kwupụtara na Yacouba ga-esonyere USM Alger na nkwekọrịta afọ iri abuo rụọ afọ ise.
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Nijee, nke ọ na-egwuri egwu kemgbe afọ 2012
Ọ gbara bọọlụ na 2012 African Nations Cup, nke ka ukwuu dị ka onye azụ aka nri, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ gbaa bọọlụ n'asọmpi 2012 Africa Cup of Nations
E wepụrụ ndị otu ya mgbe agba nke otu gasịrị.
